title: Being Sweet And Loving Works
description:
Stephanie didn't want to hear it but ultimately took Dr. Laura's advice and now her marriage is much better! - Dr. Laura: "Just be NICE no matter how you "feel" . . ."

Have you used the Proper Care and Feeding of Husbands to your advantage? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
